sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: This privacy policy describes how Playliter collects, uses, and protects user's personal information. By using our app, you agree to the terms of this policy.

sections.title: 2. Information Collected
sections.content:
Playliter collects the following information from users:

- Email Address: We collect your email address to create a user account in the app and to allow password recovery, as well as for contact and notifications purposes.
- Username: You create a username within the app, which is used for identification. This username is visible to other app users.
- Password: A password is created by the user to secure their account within the app.

sections.title: 3. Use of Information
sections.content:
The information collected is used for the following purposes:

- Authentication: The email address and password are used to authenticate access to your account in the app.
- Communications: We may contact you via email to provide information about updates, new features, or issues with your account.

sections.title: 4. Sharing of Information
sections.content: Playliter does not share your personal information with third parties, except when required to comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: 5. Information Security
sections.content: We take appropriate security measures to protect user information and ensure its safe use.

sections.title: 6. Changes to Privacy Policy
sections.content: We reserve the right to make changes to this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be communicated to users through the app or via email.

sections.title: 7. Contact
sections.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us at mazurco066@gmail.com.
